```{r}
# libraries
library(data.table)
library(tidyverse)
library(haven)
library(tidyr)
```

```{r}
# read data
surveyobs_raw <-
  read_sav("Regions_prelim_dataset.sav")
diag_raw <-
  read_sav("ukraine_dia.sav")
cidi_raw <-
  read_sav("ukraine_main_RU_0161219.sav")
```

```{r}
# religion dataset
cidi <-
  cidi_raw %>%
  filter(!is.na(DE4)) %>%
  select(sampleid, DE32_1, DE32_2, DE32_3, DE32_4, DE32_5, DE32_6, DE32_7, DE32_8, DE32_9, DE32_98, DE32_99)

write_sav(cidi, "religion.sav")
```

```{r}
# chern. q
cher <-
  cidi_raw %>%
  select(sampleid, dm40)
```

```{r}
# subset diag data
alc_raw <-
  diag_raw %>%
  select(sampleid, DSM_ALA, DSM_ALD, D_ALA12, D_ALD12)
anx_raw <-
  diag_raw %>%
  select(sampleid, DSM_GAD, DSM_PDS, DSM_SO, DSM_AGO, D_GAD12, D_PDS12, D_SO12, D_AGO12)
ied_raw <-
  diag_raw %>%
  select(sampleid, DSM_IED, D_IED12)
aff_raw <-
  diag_raw %>%
  select(sampleid, DSM_MDE, DSM_DYS, D_MDE12, D_DYS12)
```
